messages.subject: Re: Unschooling.info message boards
messages.msgSnippet: I m so glad to hear that they re going to come back! I was very sad to see them down. I can t tell you how much I love and appreciate the work you guys did/ do
messages.messageBody:
I'm so glad to hear that they're going to come back! I was very sad
to see them down. I can't tell you how much I love and appreciate the
work you guys did/ do to get those boards up - Jon too!


--- In unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com, Pamela Sorooshian

work)

back -

> So - we have to figure out how to re-upload the forum code and get
it

> Rue Kream's DEAR husband, Jon, is working on this for us. So -
please

messages.subject: Unschooling.info message boards
messages.msgSnippet: I just wanted to let you all know that the unschooling.info message boards ARE still being worked on and we will get them back. The server had a major hardware
messages.messageBody:
I just wanted to let you all know that the unschooling.info message
boards ARE still being worked on and we will get them back.

The server had a major hardware failure. Everything has been
transferred to a new (and, they say, more reliable) server.

But the forum code (the program that makes the message boards work)
has been "corrupted." We think we can get all the past message back -
they're all there and not impacted, but the registered member list is
messed up.

So - we have to figure out how to re-upload the forum code and get it
to find the old messages. Once that is done, people will probably
have to register again if they want to post.

Rue Kream's DEAR husband, Jon, is working on this for us. So - please
be patient and grateful.

Hang in there ----

-Pam Sorooshian
